participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, always eager to try new experiences.
participant_1.background: I'm single and focusing on my martial arts. I never cook. I live in the suburbs of a major city. My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things. I eat a lot of fish.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Creative and dedicated, with a love for hobbies and a strong connection to family.
participant_2.background: I'm planning to work on my model car project and go to a baseball game. I moved to America when I was 14. I like drinking expensive wine. I eat out more than three times a week. I fear that my family will be judged for the way they are.

content.text: I've been eating a lot of fish lately.
I love fish. What's your favorite kind?
Salmon, I love the way it smells and tastes.
Salmon's great. I also like shrimp and scallops.
I love seafood. I live in the suburbs of a major city.
I like seafood too. I moved to America when I was 14.
Wow, where did you move from?
I moved from Mexico. I'm still getting used to the American culture.
I'm sure it's a big change. What do you miss most about Mexico?
I miss my family the most. I'm afraid they will be judged for the way they are.
I'm sure they won't be judged. I'm sure they're great people.
Thanks, I hope so. I'm going to go work on my model car project now.
Sounds fun. Have a good time!
